text:
Similar to Bug 34033.
When I try to delete a Host created with the Admin tool using the Delete Existing Hosts menu item, loading the page fails with a HTTP 500 error.

java.lang.NullPointerException

creator: mmalina@redhat.com
markt@apache.org
text: The patch has been proposed for 5.5.x

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed in 5.5.x and will be included in 5.5.29 onwards.
